name: hacktoberfest-board
description: [Hacktoberfest](https://hacktoberfest.digitalocean.com/) is a month long virtual festival event to celebrate open source contributions presented by [Digital Ocean](https://www.digitalocean.com/), [Intel](https://hacktoberfest.digitalocean.com/intel.pdf) and [DEV](https://dev.to/). It is the easiest way to get into open source!
author: Decoded_Cipher
